level.heading: Delivery by Mayor.
level.text: Except as otherwise provided by ยง 29-106.02 or by law other than this title, the Mayor may deliver any record to a person by delivering it to the person that submitted it, to the address of the person's registered agent, to the principal office address of the person, or to another address the person provides to the Mayor for delivery.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
